sentences.en: Biologists need to compare xerophyte and hydrophyte
sentences.cn: 生物学家需要对比旱生植物和水生植物。

sentences.en: Casuarina equisetifolia is a tropical xerophyte species and can adapt in ighlt salinized soil.
sentences.cn: 木麻黄是热带旱生类型植物，但能适应轻盐渍土。

sentences.en: The species of mesophyte are the most of ecological type of water and those of xerophyte take 7.51%. The volcanic landform has a profound influence on plant diversity.
sentences.cn: 在水分生态类型中，中生植物是主要的生态类型，旱生植物占总种数的7.51%。火山地貌对植物多样性具有深刻影响。

trans.tran_en: a xerophilous plant, such as a cactus
